sources.title: Stolen Lives
sources.description: A detective deals with the loss of his own son while trying to uncover the identity of a boy whose mummified remains are found in a box buried for fifty years.

metadata.Plot: The film follows a young teenage boy, Marcus, who is desperate to make a name for himself in the urban street of London. Keen to impress his gang leader he agrees to take on a weighty job with a strict deadline. Things get worst when Marcus's mother decides to kick him out the house and he is reluctantly forced to live with his father. Out of his comfort zone and territory, the situation turns hopeless when rumour gets back to the ring leader that he ran away with the earnings.
